title: Implement transcript upload UI
description: Add UI for recording, uploading, and pasting transcripts in Meetings tab. Show upload options when no transcript is present.

title: Fix Cloudflare build errors
description: Resolve ESLint and unused variable errors blocking deployment.

title: Hide empty summary sections in Meetings
description: Only show summary sections if there is real data. Show upload options if no transcript or summary.

title: DocuSign integration research
description: Investigate DocuSign API integration and pricing for e-signature workflows.

title: User Auth (Google OAuth)
description: Implement Google OAuth login and JWT-based authentication (frontend and backend).

title: Meetings List & Details
description: Display meetings grouped by date, with selectable details and tabs for summary, transcript, and notes.

title: Transcript Upload/Recording Backend Endpoints
description: Implement backend endpoints for uploading, recording, and pasting transcripts.

title: AI Summary/Chat Integration
description: Integrate OpenAI for meeting summary adjustment and AI chat about meetings.

title: Client Management
description: List, view, and manage clients in the dashboard.

title: Templates/Settings
description: Implement templates for emails/meetings and basic user/config settings.

title: Cloudflare Deployment
description: Deploy both frontend and backend to Cloudflare Pages and Workers.
